name:E‚Äçr‚Äçi‚Äçn
info:Fairmont Gold Room, Lounge Access, 1 King Bed Garden View
info:Stayed in October 2021
info:Family
info:3 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted October 12, 2021
msg:The service at this hotel is second to none.  The staff was exceptional and the thoughtful detail were very much appreciated. Communication with the hotel before, during and after our stay was excellent and it was so helpful to have so many people around who spoke English. 

We travelled as a family with an 11 month old. When we first arrived she was greeted right away and given a plush monkey that she held onto the whole trip. The crib was great and children‚Äôs amenities such as toiletries, a robe and slippers were added in our room for herÔºåwhich was such a nice bonus. The kids play zone and library were spotless and so well taken care of. It is open everyday from 9am-9pm and if the perfect place to go to take a break from the sun or in our case the rain. 

Emily in the executive lounge took excellent care of us and was always so kind and welcoming.  Wine, cocktails and cider are available during happy hour. It would be nice to also have beer as an option as well as a little more variety from one day to the next.

Vedat the general manager was very open to feedback and quickly made changes when possible. With this kind of mindset the hotel will quickly become one of the best in Sanya. 

If you are a young family who is looking for a calm relaxing holiday this is a great option.

Some things to keep in mind: 

Hotel is really only surrounded by other 5* hotels so not many other food options available.

Haitang Bay is gorgeous and is perfect if you like to walk the beach but swimming is not allowed.
----------------------------------------
name:M‚Äçc‚ÄçI‚Äçn‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äçs
info:Deluxe Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Garden View
info:Stayed in January 2022
info:Couples
info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted February 17, 2022
msg:I want to first thank the excellent team at Fairmont Sanya for taking such good care of my family and I during our stay. From the very first greeting upon arrival through to the kind service during check-in and throughout our stay I can safely say this is a top notch experience overall. Especially grateful to Vedat Yildirim and the team that took care of us when we were met with the unfortunate experience of having to leave this great hotel and go to a quarantine! (we had a close contact case with someone on the airplane on the way to Sanya).

Generally speaking we over index on 'facilities' and 'hardware' and under-index when it comes to 'service'. The smile you receive from staff, the helpful hand to carry things or point out others. It just makes a world of difference. And also it is the HARDEST thing to improve. It takes a lot of effort to train staff, to build a culture of courtesy and really deliver something that feels 5-star. 

For comparison, I have been to just about every single major hotel in Sanya (Rosewood, JW, Edition, Park Hyatt, Ritz Carlton, ... ) and I think only the Ritz Carlton can compare when I'm talking about the software/service of an experience. Something that makes you feel you are being taken care of. Yes, Edition is 'trendier', yes Park Hyatt has a nicer beach... but honestly - I'm kinda tired of overhyped hotels full of fake-KOLs taking selfies (I'm looking at you Rosewood. Stay at Rosewood and see if A) the bar is open or B) even if all their restaurants open - they don't have enough competent or trained staff. It's just the reality.) 

So I'll definitely be considering other Fairmont hotels in the future for business travel and return trips to Sanya. 
----------------------------------------
name:A‚Äçl‚Äçe‚Äçx‚ÄçR‚ÄçJ
info:Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Ocean View
info:Stayed in July 2021
info:Couples
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted July 28, 2021
msg:We stayed at Fairmont for 4 days, each one of which was an absolutely wonderful experience. The hotel is totally new and overall the environment and its facilities look fancy and beautifully decorated, with a mixed of modern and traditional Chinese style -specially the lobby is just breathtaking-. But in our opinion, the main value of the hotel is its absolutely perfect service and all their lovely staff, who literally does everything possible to make your stay perfect: in our case, I spent my birthday there, and everyone had so many details to make my day just unforgettable (an outstanding dinner, a spa session, some details on the bedroom and even flowers for my girlfriend!) ; special mention to Emily, who arranged all surprises and activities for us in such lovely manner, and the singing guys from the bar, who even came along to sing at my dinner on their day off. Thanks!! Breakfast is also delicious and abundant, and the rooms are quite wide, luminous and exquisitely decorated, with great variety of amenities. 
The beach by the hotel looks great and quite close to access; a pity that you cannot swim there because of the waves. 
The only small drawback was the laundry service: there is no cost specified on the hotel guide and we were quite surprised of the expensive amount charged just for a tiny bag of clothes; however, they were helpful when explained the situation and gave us half price discount, so no big deal. 

Overall, an amazing experience and totally recommended hotel if visiting Sanya. Don‚Äôt miss the chance to go! We will certainly do so.

name:Q‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçy‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçl‚Äça‚Äçn
info:Fairmont Duplex Family Suite Garden View

posted:Posted April 26, 2024
msg:I stayed in Sanya for a month, and this is the most satisfying hotel I have stayed in Sanya. I am glad that I escaped from Yalong Bay Marriott and chose Fairmont. In comparison, Yalong Bay Marriott is too bad, too bad, small and low, and the food is very bad! Fairmont is the only hotel on the island except Raffles that has the charm of Bali hotels. As soon as I arrived at the hotel, I found that it was a treasure. The hotel lobby is really elegant and graceful, because it is made of special logs, and it has a modern feel with old money style. Especially the section where the lobby extends to the observation deck and the underground corridor restaurant is really beautiful. The general disadvantage of Sanya hotel landscape is the lack of drop and level. Unlike Bali, the dense tropical rainforest is built with cliffs and drops, which is comparable to a fairyland. The end-viewing tower of the lobby of Fairmont can take you back to Bali in an instant. It is so beautiful to look out. The hotel has the culture of the Li ethnic group and is designed as a small Venice. The gondola is so beautiful. The water in Venice is constantly circulating and filtered, so it is not smelly and is much better than the water in real Venice. Hotel guests can make an appoin**ent to take a boat every day. Because it is off-season, the hotel is very generous and will take the initiative to upgrade the room type for guests. Compared with Marriott's stinginess (collecting a deposit of 1,000 yuan per day, charging for all minibars, and promoting plastic water cups for children), Fairmont is quite generous. No deposit, all drinks and snacks in the minibar are free, and they are replenished unlimitedly every day. Even at one end of the walking corridor, there will be several free Sanya specialty ice drinks for guests to enjoy. Check-in can be early according to the cleaning of the room (Marriott generally cannot get the room card before 3:30 pm). All the staff of Fairmont are very nice and take the initiative to greet, smile, and be enthusiastic. The staff is well equipped. The hotel covers a large area. If you don't want to walk, you can call 0 to call for a battery car to pick you up at any time. The hotel swimming pool is very large and beautiful, with a maximum depth of 1.5 meters and a minimum shallowness of 20 meters, which meets the needs of everyone (Marriott is very small, with a maximum depth of less than 1.2 meters, which cannot be used by adults and is a children's paddling pool). The hotel has its own historical old house. The original version of Du Yuesheng Mansion was moved from Shanghai to Fairmont, which is worth visiting. There are also many ancient log architectural carvings that can be savored one by one. The hotel has its own huge golf course. The green is particularly beautiful against the backdrop of special plants. The hotel should have a helicopter üöÅ. In March and April, the sea water in Haitang Bay is calmer than that in Yalong Bay. The hotel has its own beach. The sand on the beach is more delicate and smooth than that in Yalong Bay. It is very worth experiencing and absolutely good for taking pictures. The hotel has rich meals, which are renewed every day, and you will not get tired of eating them for basically a week. The buffet dinner at the same price is twice as rich as Marriott, with barbecue and hot pot. There are 6 dining tables in the evening, and there are live food production performances in the middle. The hotel's sunset ceremony at 6:30 every day is worth participating. The hotel's toiletries are all environmentally friendly, including toothpaste, toothbrushes and purified water, which is commendable. The hotel is the most cost-effective and treasured hotel in Sanya!

name:M‚Äça‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçd‚Äçu‚Äço‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçc‚Äça‚Äçi

posted:Posted May 7, 2024
msg:Fairmont Hotel is basically the same as the pictures I saw online. It has a luxurious Southeast Asian style, a lot of wood and stone craftsmanship, and both the rooms and public areas are very thoughtfully designed.
Advantages: The hotel covers a large area, and the basic room starts at 60 square meters. Guests will also be equipped with a hotel butler to provide corresponding services. This time, the butler, Ms. Nicole Hu, who served me, was very professional, responded to problems in a timely manner, and gave fresh fruits. There are many supporting activities in the hotel, including special boat activities, the Wood Art Museum moved from the original site of Old Shanghai, the helicopter base in the hotel, the open-air cinema by the sea, etc. You can have fun all day without leaving the hotel.
Just talking about the shortcomings of personal habits, because it is too large, each area is very far and needs to be detoured. It takes about ten minutes to get off the car from the drop-off area to the room. Basically, I don‚Äôt want to go out after returning to the room. Although the room is large, the bathroom, shower room, and washing and drying area are not large. Due to the design and material selection, the shower room and wash basin will splash water everywhere. The sound insulation of the room is not very good. The birds and cicadas outside in the late night and early morning, and the crying of children in the next room are all clear.

msg:Because I stayed in the hotel for a long time, I had the opportunity to experience the hotel's various facilities and services carefully, which made me and my family very satisfied.
The hotel arranged a Nicole Hu (Hu Zixin) from the guest experience depar**ent to connect with me. The service was very good. She helped me provide information on various activities in the hotel, helped us book cruises and travel photography, so that we spent more time enjoying the hotel facilities and services instead of spending a lot of time exploring. I think travel photography is a feature of this hotel, because the overall architectural style is very Southeast Asian, and the various wood carvings are also very delicate and large in size, so taking pictures in the hotel is a good choice. Xiaoli, the photographer here, is very professional. She took a lot of good photos for our family, which made us reluctant to choose photos. We simply bought a lot of them back as a souvenir, which is very meaningful.
The hotel is very close to the beach and can be reached on foot. Although it is a public beach, it is a certain distance from the beaches of other hotels, so it can be used as a private beach. The bonfire show in the evening was very exciting, and our whole family loved it. There are also many types of breakfast, and you can't experience them all at once. There are also many activities specifically for children here, which are very friendly, such as climbing coconut trees, colorful graffiti, and making various handicrafts with bamboo leaves. In fact, every day can be fully arranged.
A good hotel can bring all-round comfort and peace of mind to guests. I think Fairmont has done it.

posted:Posted March 23, 2024
msg:This is one of the most satisfying hotels I have stayed in in all my years of traveling with my children.
When I checked in, I added the WeChat account of the butler Jinmei. It was very nice. He immediately sent me a map of the entire hotel and all the activities in the hotel. When I was told that I didn‚Äôt have enough drinking water, I sent a WeChat message and immediately arranged for the staff to bring it to me. Many of them helped me delay my check-out time because I had children. If I had any questions during my stay, I could always reply and solve them. Even if it was not part of my daily work, I would actively contact other depar**ents to help me with inquiries. No matter if I saw the message sooner or later, I would patiently reply as soon as possible. Simply awesome
Let‚Äôs talk about the hotel
The hotel has a comfortable a**osphere. When you get off the bus, a waiter will come to open the door to pick up your luggage. This is not just the case on the first day. Every day after that, the concierge will open and close the door when you come in and out of the taxi.
The entire hotel building is made of solid wood in Southeast Asian style. The facilities are clean and tidy. The layout of the rooms is reasonable and comfortable. Hygiene details are very good. When the cleaning staff found children's clothes when cleaning, they would also take the initiative to leave a note to add children's toiletries. The staff's attentiveness is reflected in every aspect. aspect
All service staff in the hotel will take the initiative to say hello when they meet them. They will smile and nod to say hello anytime and anywhere. They are also very friendly when seeing children. This is particularly great.
The hotel's children's pool provides bubble games every afternoon from 4.30-5.30. Children especially like it and must go every afternoon.
The beach is clean, there are few people, and the sea water is clear. Free sand digging tools are provided. Remember to put them back where they were after use.
I purchased a two-night package in a king-size bed room, which includes a buffet dinner and special privileges. It can be seen that Ctrip attaches great importance to users. There are candy boxes for the children and foie gras, durian, pizza and raspberry cake. I will also take the initiative to ask if I want them. It was a great experience to taste the buffet food. The overall food was great. The price of the set meal was really affordable. The staff also invited us to sit in the member breakfast dining area the next day. Although there is no special trea**ent in this area, it can be regarded as a staff member. Careful arrangements for treating Ctrip users
Of course, the hotel's breakfast is also very rich, rich in variety and delicious. Breakfast is provided until 11 o'clock.
There is a water system surrounding the hotel, and you can experience the dragon boat once a day. You can ask the butler to help you make an appoin**ent, or you can go directly to the queue to make an appoin**ent. It is currently considered the off-season for tourism, and you have to wait about 10 minutes to get in line. The whole trip takes more than 10 minutes, and it is very comfortable.
From the whole stay experience, the hotel treats every guest with care, responsibility, and friendly attitude. It is true that every waiter can do this. It can be seen that the hotel management and training are in place.
I feel that this hotel is my most successful choice for this trip. I will take my children to the hotel again during the holidays. I hope the hotel can maintain this level and continue to do so.

The whole hotel has six buildings, distributed in the water system, known as the Venice Water City of Sanya. Guests staying in the hotel can make an appoin**ent in advance to take a dragon boat cruise, or make an appoin**ent in advance to follow the photographer in the hotel park for 30 minutes, and give 5 photos for free. The rest of the photos you like will be charged at the marked price. The photographer is serious and responsible, and the photos he took are very professional. The free breakfast provided by the hotel is of good quality and variety. For dinner, you can choose a buffet restaurant with a full range of varieties, and there is also a small hot pot, and drinks are free. The hotel also has a Chinese restaurant where you can order food. At first we went to the Chinese restaurant, but my husband wanted to see how the buffet was. Our Chinese restaurant received us. A tall, thin and handsome guy took the initiative to lead us to the building of the buffet restaurant and explained it clearly to the service staff of the buffet restaurant. Let us visit the dishes and decide whether to dine in this hotel. After seeing the dishes, my husband was very satisfied and decided to dine in this hotel directly. We felt that every service staff was considerate of the guests and provided meticulous and thoughtful service. Because of the meticulous service of the staff, we decided to check in at this hotel at that time. This formed a satisfactory experience of one-stop food, accommodation and entertainment. The hotel park has free parking and electric vehicle charging piles. I forgot which parking lot I parked my car in. The receptionist at the entrance of the hotel drove an electric car to take me to my own parking place, and then the waiter drove to lead the way to help me find the parking lot near Building 1 where I lived. I am very satisfied with the food, accommodation and entertainment at our Fairmont Sanya Haitang Bay. I will come here again to eat, stay and play

name:T‚Äço‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçT‚Äçr‚Äça‚Äçv‚Äçe‚Äçl
info:Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Garden View
info:Stayed in April 2024
info:Couples
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted April 25, 2024
msg:This hotel is one of those amazing places that exceeded our expectations. Here you feel more like in Venice than in China :)
When we booked this hotel, we were hoping to get a huge area and fairly high service. But we never expected to see here a real palace with architectural and interior sophistication, immersed in greenery like the ‚ÄúHanging Gardens of Babylon‚Äù.

The hotel has a highlight: upon entering, you immediately find yourself on a high arched bridge spanning the canal. From the bridge there is a romantic view of boats scurrying back and forth, more like Venetian gondolas. On one of them we were able to walk through the entire hotel area and see it from the water. It's nice that this option is available to all hotel guests.

In the evening, a sunset ceremony is held by the water: an opera diva on one of the boats sings mesmerizingly with a magical voice. During the ceremony, everyone can receive a letter with a prediction.
And later in the evening, a fantastic fire show takes place in front of the pool.

There are also 2 beautiful traditional pagodas and one ancient Chinese mansion.

The location of the hotel, like the others, is on the first line. Although the beach is not equipped and swimming is officially prohibited, nothing prevents you from walking along the sea and enjoying the beautiful view.

I would also like to note the special disposition of the staff, who are ready to help with any question at any time. I would especially like to thank the employee Joly (she speaks English), who was in touch throughout our stay at the hotel and resolved all our issues easily and quickly.

The rooms are beautiful, I would even say stylish, more like mini-villas. The rooms have everything you need and even more. They clean/check 2 times a day :) Very beautiful views, especially if they give you (upgrade like us) a room facing into the territory, where you can see the sea.

Breakfast until 11:00! The choice of everything is huge, and the local cuisine also includes more familiar European dishes, and a lot of sweets.

This hotel captivated us! I wanted to come back here again and stay longer :))

According to Tomas Travel rating, the hotel is 10/10, breakfast 5/5!

msg:The architectural design of the hotel is very distinctive. It feels like being in Venice when you take a cruise through the river. The lobby's gorgeous wood-carved dome, ancient wooden pavilion, and corridors with red lanterns have a very classical Chinese style. Even the table in the room is a wood-carved painting. There are also sunset ceremonies and fire dance performances with local ethnic characteristics. Thanks to the housekeeper Leal for his thoughtful service. Before checking in, he sent us the hotel's guide on WeChat, helped us make reservations for various activities, and delivered water and room supplies in a timely manner. Although the children's playground is temporary and a little small, the staff is very attentive to take care of the children, unlike some hotels where they sit there and play with their phones all the time. I have been to Sanya three times and stayed in many hotels. Fairmont is relatively special and it is quite comfortable to stay.

msg:It was a pleasant stay at Fairmont. I heard that it used to be Kempinski Hotel. The hotel is indeed a bit old and the appearance is a bit old. Nicole Xiaohu from the Guest Relations Depar**ent contacted me in advance the day before check-in and introduced the hotel activities. She was very attentive during the stay and check-out. The visit to the Li Fire Dance Show and the Republic of China Mansion was very good. I will go again if I have the chance.
I have read a lot of bad reviews about Fairmont before, and I was still quite nervous before going. I don‚Äôt know if it was because there were not many people in the off-season. The overall service was very online. I went there from Ritz, and the check-in was much faster than Ritz, and the service attitude was also better. Of course, the hotel facilities cannot be compared with Ritz. After all, the price is much cheaper. It is highly recommended for family travel and people who pursue cost-effectiveness. The breakfast is also rich. Although the executive lounge has few varieties, the quality is very good. It is very suitable for my appetite and I am very happy. The food is also replenished in time, and there is no problem of empty plates. There were many bad things said before, I don‚Äôt know why, my experience is still highly recommended. msg:The overall experience was beyond expectations~ Before the trip, my dad strained his leg and needed a cane, which made walking inconvenient, so I called the hotel to ask about the wheelchair rental situation before making a reservation. I asked Fairmont and Atlantis, and based on the feedback from the front desk and concierge, Fairmont won by a lot. There was no signal on the cruise ship before arriving, so I confirmed the wheelchair and checked in after getting off the ship. In this situation, I arrived at the hotel around 11 o'clock and checked in directly if there was a room available. The housekeeper Xiao Luo helped us get the wheelchair and accompanied us all the way to the room. He introduced the hotel's facilities and what we could do, and patiently explained it to my parents. During the subsequent check-in time, he helped us book activities and communicate with us. Answered all kinds of weird questions for meüòÖ, the service attitude is very good~
The restaurant is also very good. There is a special area for Ctrip members for breakfast. The buffet dinner provided by the hotel has a small hot pot. It would be better if the firepower could be bigger~üòÜThe freshly made dragon fish soup is very fresh. I chatted with the chef for a while. , he took it very seriously when he learned that we were guests booked on the Ctrip platform. He cooked foie gras and steak, grilled durian pizza, and even cooked the flamed beef bone marrow for all to be delivered that night. You can chat with the chef. What a surpriseüòÜüòÜüòÜ~
I would also like to particularly mention the Wood Art Museum, which contains the owner‚Äôs private collection. I selected some for display. It is said that the owner is 70 years old. Although the exhibits are not made of particularly expensive wood, they are very representative and include carvings. It was very beautiful, and the lecturer Xiao Zhang also told it very well. In addition to introducing the wood art itself, there was also a lot of expanded content. Even the characters in the photos on the wall and the stories behind them were told vividly, and we put in a lot of effort~ Everyone in this group loves to ask questions and had a great time chatting with Xiao ZhangüòÜüòÜ
I met a wedding. In the afternoon, there was a beautiful lawn wedding facing the sea with spring flowers blooming. In the cool night, there was a prosperous fire dance show to entertain the dinner. The newlyweds must be unforgettable~‚ù§Ô∏è
Finally, I have a small suggestion. I hope to keep hand sanitizer in the room, and it would be better to add hand cream in the restaurant bathroom~

posted:Posted March 16, 2024
msg:Traveling alone, wind signs, starting from Hangzhou

You should be able to see the Fairmont hotel environment online, and it‚Äôs pretty much the same. When you read reviews, you mainly look at the service attitude and stay experience. The following is my personal experience for reference only.

In order to facilitate diving and duty-free shops, I changed from Yalong Bay to Haitang Bay, and from St. Regis to Fairmont. The hotel's service staff were very nice, from the housekeeper Lulu to the shuttle bus driver and the cleaning aunt. They were all very nice. The overall environment of the hotel is not as bad as stated online, but because of the all-wood decoration, the ceilings in some corridors are already moldy. In such a humid south, it is strange that the water system is not moldy. The check-in process was very smooth. People with severe nasal allergies couldn't stand the damp and musty smell when they entered the room they booked. The housekeeper, Amanda, Xiao Sun Lulu upgraded her to a sea view room. As expected, she didn't see the sea, but it still smelled a bit like wood. Another thing that had to be cueed was The plug in the hotel was so difficult to use that it couldn't be inserted tightly at all. I had to hold the plug with one hand when drying my hair. If I didn't hold it, it would fall off. There is a construction site next door, and helicopters fly over from time to time. There is always noise during the day. Because I still have to work, I was already thinking about changing hotels as soon as I checked in.

The Western restaurant is a buffet, and the service staff will ignore you after paying, and no one will take your seat. The service awareness of some employees in the restaurant is really average. It was 7:30 when I went there. There were not many dishes in the restaurant. I saw grilled scallops in a stall. There were ingredients, but the boy was not ready to cook them. The layout of the ingredients in the restaurant is very scattered. I asked the waiter if he could help me get a drink, but he was politely declined. In short, in this restaurant, if you are not the person he wants to serve, you have no service at all. It‚Äôs hard to explain in one word, but I understand everything. I was already ready to eat a healthy meal. I made some mediocre hotpot with mutton and vegetables, and planned to change to a hotel the next day.

But my friends were in for a surprise. Leo Yu, the head chef of the Western restaurant, was very kind and took the initiative to ask for their needs. Later, he served his special Wagyu beef to the table. The round-faced Awei made a dessert with a little alcohol flavor, and Dafeng made beef. Bone marrow and baked lobster, and there was also a lively little performance, which was super fun! ! The emotional value is directly filled up! Originally I didn't plan to have dinner today. I went to learn diving in the afternoon and almost drowned. It also rained a little. The wind blew and I was almost freezing. I was in a low mood. A stomach-churning meal made me secrete dopamine. After reading the online reviews of this head chef, I saw that he is also very patient with children. When a customer is about to leave the restaurant, he comes specifically to say goodbye to him. He still has a very charming personality. However, the team is not strong enough, and the great master leads the novices to feel powerless. If you go there during this time, you can contact Leo directly and tell him that it is the review he saw on Ctrip. You will get the above services that I have experienced.

In addition, Sanya wall promotion in March! ! ! The weather is super comfortable and it‚Äôs fun to walk around. If you don't go to the hotel specifically for rest and vacation, then these trivial services are not important. It is enough to go out and play every day and come back to sleep, and the hotel still gets what you pay for.

name:A‚Äçn‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg
info:Fairmont Duplex Family Suite Ocean View
info:Stayed in February 2024
info:Family
info:5 Reviews
rating:2
posted:Posted February 20, 2024
msg:I took the elderly and children with me and chose the Fairmont Hotel, which has more activities. Because I wanted 2 rooms and also considered the cost-effectiveness, I had lowered my expectations. But I was still surprised after checking in.
The room facilities are as shown below. I have been coming to Sanya twice a year since 2019. I have stayed in more than half of the hotels from Yalong Bay to Haitang Bay to Clear Water Bay. This is the first time I have encountered such facilities. The decoration is like an express hotel, but it is also very shabby and dirty.
The room is not soundproofed, so the sound of people walking outside the door and the chirping of birds are very loud. There will be two sudden very loud noises in the wall for no reason, like a heavy object falling to the ground or a switch of a large equipment.
The landscaping is very unrefined and the water in the children's heated pool is almost black.
The executive lounge has no view, only fruit snacks, and no cup of coffee is hot from breakfast to the lounge, it is all about 40 degrees Celsius. The lounge didn't have anything to eat later, which was the worst I've ever had in any lounge.
The buffet dinner included in the room rate was terrible.
One thing to say, the hotel has advantages: the catering is good, the breakfast is rich, and the Chinese restaurant produces high-quality food at affordable prices.
Most of the staff have a good attitude. Except for the front desk guy who has a cold face, the rest are responsive to my needs. Especially the housekeeper Xiao Sun has been comforting me and helping me solve my problems. But the hotel facilities are such that it cannot be solved. The beach is nice, not too windy and clean, and there are no deck chairs.
The fire dance show and canal cruise are very beautiful.
But I couldn't sleep all night, and I wasn't in the mood to appreciate the beautiful scenery.
Above, the hotel that costs more than 3,000 yuan per night cannot even provide a quiet sleeping space. The hotel has no other expression except a verbal apology, so I can only leave a negative review.
----------------------------------------

msg:Overall, the hotel still gives people a refreshing and good feeling. After all, many details are well done. If you were in other places, you might not have so many perfect experiences.

Facilities: The hotel's furnishings are very classical. Compared with other modern decoration styles, it emphasizes a more stable temperament. If you are a person who likes classical culture, you may have some resonance when you come here. In addition, it may be maintained regularly, so it does not look old.
The swimming pool design here is also very beautiful, but the water is a bit cold, so I didn't go in to play, but there is a constant temperature pool. The interior design of the hotel is very ingenious. It adopts the form of a waterway, which is a bit like taking a boat in Venice.
The furnishings in the lobby upon entering are very stylish, and can even be said to be ingenious. Among them, caissons may be relatively rare in museums and ancient buildings (refer to the caissons in Beijing Ancient Architecture Museum, which are quite similar).
The facilities in the house are also antique, but what needs to be mentioned is the small table at the end of the bed. Some of it hurt my knees. I didn't pay attention and it hurt a lot. I hope it can be rounded.

Environment: The greening is very good, and you can often see one scene at a time, so you can find many good angles when traveling and shooting. The boat is well worth experiencing. In addition, there are sunset ceremonies and evening performances, which are very visual.
Plus, the putting experience is fun.

Service: Before arriving, Xiao Yang gave me a warm reception, added WeChat, introduced the hotel's facilities, and upgraded the room. Unexpectedly, the room number was the same as the last number on the mobile phone, which was very easy to remember. praise! During the process, he was always on call and proactively helped solve problems, which was great.
Xiao Zhang from the Wood Art Museum gave very detailed and thoughtful explanations. I think he loves his job very much. It's a pity that I heard there were kittens here before I came here, but they were given away a few months ago because I was worried that the cat hair would affect the guests. But I think the cats won't have much impact as long as they are friendly. In such a place full of humanistic a**osphere, having cats will increase aura.

Hygiene: The staff responsible for floor cleaning are also very responsible. I commend Chen Haiying for helping us clean very cleanly during the period.

FOOD:
One more thing to add is the dining experience in Chinese restaurants. The quality and taste of the dishes are not consistent with five-star restaurants.
The buffet has a rich variety, but in terms of desserts, it lacks delicious cakes, which is a bit of a pity.
The orange juice is freshly squeezed and very good.

After visiting the Republic of China Residence, there was a docent girl named Zou Meng who made my baby very happy. She was very gentle and greeted us with a smile. She was worried that we would take too many things and even called a car in the hotel to take us to the swimming pool. It‚Äôs really a big hotel and the service is great.

At dinner, the uncle who didn‚Äôt remember his name and didn‚Äôt know his position also gave the baby a toy. For breakfast, the uncle gave the baby a pack of biscuits. Anyway, it was really popular and everyone was very enthusiastic.
Full of comfort

swimming pool:
Not big, not small, the deepest is only 1.5 meters
It‚Äôs really cold at the end of November for children outdoors
The water temperature is the same no matter when you play during the day
The bubbles in the bubble party are a bit pungent, but the children's water slide is really fun. Children like it and they can spray water.
The good thing is that there is a small hot spring pool
When it gets cold, everyone crowds into the hot springs, haha

I took the cruise that I had been thinking about for a long time. I took it the next day. It was a little sunny at noon and I circled around it. It was very suitable for taking pictures.

Dinner and fire dance show
You can also go to the beach
It‚Äôs just that the waves are so big that I can‚Äôt get into the sea.

2. The hotel has a beautiful environment and is very distinctive. There is a cruise ship inside the hotel, which is full of romantic Venetian style, and there is also a wood art museum, which displays Chinese wood art aesthetics and culture, combining Chinese and Western styles, which is very interesting. In particular, Ms. Zou Meng‚Äôs explanations from the Wood Art Museum were popular, comprehensive and unforgettable.
3. Compared with many hotels we stayed in, Fairmont is very cost-effective.
There is a lot of wood art in the hotel, and even the desks in the rooms are carved works, which is super high-end.

Next time I come to Sanya, I will choose to stay in this hotel. I have left a very good memory here.

Smooth, quiet, relaxing, comfortable
The hotel said they were
The only hotel in Hainan with sea water channels.
Meet the fruit stall on the boat
Helped me [happy]

Overall, I am satisfied. The price/performance ratio is relatively high in Haitang Bay. I hope it gets better! !

I like its design: from the long covered bridge before entering the lobby to the tall and wide lobby that reaches the sea; to the water system that surrounds each house and the entire hotel, with gondola boats going back and forth; to the water system that is not far away. Brick by brick, a large mansion of the Republic of China was transported and restored from Shanghai; to a rich breakfast menu, exquisite afternoon tea, and cocktails... The most important thing is the natural, warm and thoughtful service provided by all well-trained staff from receptionists to housekeepers. Every detail makes you feel comfortable, assured and at ease. All the fatigue and tension can be melted away in these details. Facing the sea, return to your heart.
The only drawback is that because the water system is too close to the guest room, there will be some musty smell in the room (only this time I had such a problem). I hope I won't be disappointed next time.

msg:The hotel has a very good environment with its own surrounding river, which feels a bit like Venice. There is a free boat tour. The sunset show and fire dance show are also great. The room is quite spacious and there is no problem in terms of hygiene. It is very environmentally friendly. There are basically no plastic products. Mineral water, toothpaste, etc. are all in paper packaging. There are also some flaws, probably due to the age. The door lock is not very smooth. The air conditioning in the elevator and the restaurant are not powerful. It is quite hot to eat. Fortunately, the air conditioning in the room is okay. The hotel covers a large area and has a small golf course. The green plants are well maintained. There is an ancient building next to the lawn that is said to have been completely moved from Shanghai. If you are interested, you can take a look. Walking around the hotel early in the morning, I saw all kinds of fallen flowers, which were quite beautiful. In terms of location, you can walk to the beach in five minutes. The waves are very big and you can't swim. You can only play in the sand and catch small crabs. The free photoshoot provided is not satisfactory. I don‚Äôt recommend trying it. In terms of service, the front desk and restaurant staff are very good. The staff in the lobby may have just started working. If you don't know something, you should ask your superiors. The butler service is very average and the response is slow. Compared with the 24-hour online service of other hotels (maybe on a shift basis), it is a bit worse.

msg:I stayed in a family duplex sea view suite for 4 nights during the National Day. The whole family was very satisfied. I personally feel that this is a seriously underestimated hotel. Whether it is service, activities, or catering (lounge, buffet breakfast and dinner), it is very good! Because we were both old and young, we didn't leave the hotel for 4 days. We were not bored at all in the hotel, and we were even busy.
Compared with many hotels, in addition to the sea, beach, and swimming pool, Fairmont also has its unique wooden cultural center and dragon boat cruises, which are particularly rich and rich in experience. For the next 2 nights, we stayed in an executive room at the Ritz in Yalong Bay. The cost per night was 4 times that of Fairmont. After the experience, we felt that it was unnecessary. Even the breakfast experience at the Ritz was quite different. The seats were crowded and the taste was bad. Very average. Of course, bosses who are not short of money can still choose the Ritz (the executive rooms have room service twice a day and are closer to the beach), but for most people, especially families traveling, boldly choose Fairmont, the experience is still very good, especially Excellent value for money.
Finally, special thanks to the housekeeper Xiaojin JOLY, who took the initiative to add WeChat and helped us book many children's activities. The response was fast and the service was good. Environment: The environment of Haitang Bay is quite good. It is surrounded by better hotels and has better privacy. The hotel swimming pool is large and disinfected every day. Bath towels are provided in a timely manner and there are free swimming rings. There are many activities every day. Breakfast was pretty good. The hotel beach is very nice and I caught a lot of crabs.

Health: relatively clean

Let‚Äôs talk about the shortcomings:
Facilities: Needs some repairs. The floor drain in the shower room is not good at draining water and will overflow. Every socket is difficult to plug into. The room design is not reasonable.
Overall, I am very satisfied. It is a hotel worth visiting. The sunset ceremony is very impressive, the fire dance show is very visual, the cruise ship is very unique, the Gold Lounge and the children's activities are very good. There are also stunning beaches that are worth visiting.

In the end, my son paid for the bubble party by mistake and had to go. Dream come true again.

In addition, you must make an appoin**ent for the hotel's cruise ship early. It is best to go to the counter opposite to make a reservation directly after checking in, otherwise you may not be able to get on the boat by the time you check out...

The hotel's food and beverages are average, and the taste is really hard to describe for me, a Guangzhou native. The five-star praise is partly for the overall environment and partly for the butler Xiaojin. The service quality is good. We lost our car keys when we had dinner on the first day of our stay. Xiaojin helped contact the restaurant immediately and got them back quickly. Key, overall Fairmont is worth recommending.

msg:Four words, still full of meaning.
Where does this feeling come from? First of all, people.
The dedicated manager, Manager Li Qianqian, contacted us before check-in and sent us the content and time of the package available after check-in, so that our family could better arrange our trip. The front desk provides barrier-free one-stop check-in service and is considerate. After checking in, WeChat reminded me of meals, shuttle buses, show times, etc., which made me, an itinerary expert, useless. Seeing that there were elderly people traveling with us, in order to have a better rest, they provided a late check-out service, thinking of our childrenüëç.
Then there is the captain of the cruise ship in the hotel (I remember it was a captain named Fu)üòÑ. During the cruise, he introduced us to the background of the hotel and the history of this small canal. At the sunset ceremony in the afternoon, Manager Guo introduced us to the culture of the Li ethnic group. Not only did we participate in the event, we also learned about the cultural customs of the ethnic minorities.
Of course, there was also a mysterious hotel senior leader who met him by chance in the lobby, mistakenly thought he was the lobby manager, and gave him some advice. Unexpectedly, after listening humbly, he gave us an unexpected and thoughtful benefit.
Although I only stayed for three days and two nights, I felt personally that the hotel's culture is reflected in the words and actions of the lower-level waiters to senior managers.

Next is the scenery. The hotel environment is very good, and the garden-like a**osphere allows us northerners who love the sea to not only see the sea in Hainan, but also appreciate the forests in the south of the Yangtze River. Strolling in the garden, the family also sighed that they suddenly forgot that this trip was to watch the sea. The solid wood green lawn in the garden, the wonderful performances in the evening, professional travel photography gifts, and free fruit drinks make you realize that the hotel not only allows guests to enjoy benefits regardless of cost, but also wants to pass on to guests a kind of A culture that can be seen and heard. Although the garden is large, it can reach the sea. The designer also had good intentions. The stay was short, and there was still a lot of things to do in the park. My parents were a little regretful when we left, so we made an appoin**ent to come back for a visit at a better time.

Beautiful scenery and excellent people. Beautiful scenery is easy to come by, as is wealth. Excellence in people is rare, and it would be difficult to do so without being influenced by the sun and the eyes, and taught by everyone.
I would also like to thank Manager Li and everyone else for giving me and my family a very wonderful experience.

First of all, I am very grateful to the front office manager Judy for answering the call. After learning about our family‚Äôs travel requirements, she quickly arranged for our housekeeper Joly Jin. Miss reception. Joly is also the most conscientious and responsible among the three hotel housekeepers in Accor this time. Not only did she add WeChat three days in advance, and sent a schedule of daily activities that babies can participate in, she also informed the hotel of the free night-time ceremony activities and the Iron Flower Show performance time. , as well as the dragon boat ride schedule. When we checked in, we found that children's footrests, toiletries and small slippers were prepared in advance in the room. Very considerate. At the same time, in addition to soft slippers, the room is also equipped with beach shoes. At the same time, the hotel is also equipped with a children's club, water slides and a children's cinema, so children will not be bored even on rainy days. It‚Äôs also worth mentioning that Fairmont‚Äôs catering is the best among the three Accor hotels. The breakfast is very rich and has many Hainan specialties, such as chicken **** and vine sweet soup, refreshing and refreshing, freshly made beef patties, and Lingshui noodles. Wait, you can eat until 11 o'clock. The happy hour package in the executive lounge includes cocktails, which is also full of sincerity. The service girl in the lounge was very considerate when she saw the baby. Not only did she not blame the child for accidentally spilling the drink, she also comforted the baby and gave him small pasta and biscuits. When you walk in any corner of the Fairmont Hotel, whenever you meet the staff, they will greet you warmly and remind you to pay attention to safety on the road. When the little brother on the sightseeing bus sees the children walking back to the room from a distance, he will also take the initiative to give them a ride. Procedure. The only thing is that the hotel is a bit far from the beach and there are no beach chairs to rest on the public beach. Overall, it is a family hotel that is worth staying in, and there are no pitfalls at all. recommend!

The environment of the hotel is very comfortable, there are many activities for children to play, and the bubble party is very fun. There is also a sunset ceremony in the afternoon, which is very good. The butler joly is very considerate and helps us make reservations in advance for every event. What I want to mention in particular is that after leaving the hotel, the hotel called us specifically to inform us that we had left something and asked how to hand it over to us.
Overall stay was pleasant. Next time I come again, I will choose Fairmont.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Fairmont Twin, 2 Single Size Bed Garden View
info:Stayed in July 2023
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted July 26, 2023
msg:Different hotels üè® We have several rooms together, Xiaojin Joly met our room arrangement needs, added WeChat to us one by one, sent us hotel information and activities, etc. üòÉ, attentive service [strong] and It is really convenient to apply for late check-out. The location of the hotel can feature dragon boats, and we visited the Cultural Wooden Art Museum.
It is necessary to say: the hotel lobby is based on the rich connotation of oriental culture, using Dongyang woodcarving and precious jade from all over the world to create an elegant space, with unique ingenuity and grand momentum, giving people a refreshing sensory experience. One of the most eye-catching is the nine-fold dome. The dome is 23 meters high, with nine floors up and down, alternately in square and octagonal shapes, and finally closed in a circle. The exquisitely carved patterns on the dome and the window-like fence shine on the top surface through the hidden lights of each floor, and looking up, it is like ascending into a splendid and beautiful cultural temple. It is worth mentioning that the dome was built by Master Lu Guangzheng, the representative inheritor of the national intangible cultural heritage project, and led 7 provincial arts and crafts masters and 600 woodcarvers over a period of years. The layers are rich and delicate, the images are realistic and vivid, the carvings are fine, the style is elegant and delicate, and you will never tire of seeing them.
We had a good stay and will definitely come back next time!
----------------------------------------

msg:I brought a family of six to stay for two nights. The two elderly people lived in a standard room, and the four of us lived in a double-level sea view suite. The children were not too happy, especially the younger brother, who went up and down in the suite on the third floor every day. The lady in charge of replenishment in the guest room is super nice, and delivered a lot of snacks the next day. You must know that shopping in tourist areas is not convenient, so these small snacks and drinks in the small refrigerator are very precious. The hotel is very big, and it takes 5-8 minutes to walk from the room to the drop-off area. Due to the hot weather, several meals are ordered as takeaway. Delivery was fast too. . It is not as noisy as a parent-child hotel here, but the children are still very happy, and they are in a state of chicken blood every day. I personally feel that living in Fairmont does not need to go to any attractions. Just play the hotel. I found that the two details are well done. One is that the textiles in the hotel are all disinfected with Walch, because I use them at home, and the smell is very familiar. I lived in Huayu in Yalong Bay for the next two days, and the bedding had a peculiar smell. The second is that there will be a touch of sandalwood as soon as you enter the bathroom, which I like very much. In short, I am very satisfied, and I will stay here again when I come to Sanya in the future.

msg:Satisfaction: (Stayed in a sea view room on the fifth floor, booked two rooms, the bed is big enough for a family of four to sleep)
The staff is friendly and has a good attitude. A lady with short hair in the restaurant leads the elevator to the seat before and after the meal. After parking the car late at night and walking back to the front desk from the parking lot, the security guard will ask if you need a car. After walking all the way, I took the initiative to come up to help with the suitcase.
The hotel's breakfast is very rich. My old man has bad teeth and is very picky about food, so she told me that the hotel's breakfast is delicious.
Dissatisfied:
The barbecue buffet in the evening is not delicious, and there are few items. It costs 974 yuan for two big ones.
The road from the hotel to the beach is too broken, there is no lawn to connect with the sea, and the wooden plank road is also dilapidated, it is difficult to walk the baby artifact. The first floor of the hotel is full of stairs. I always have to move the stroller, such as going from the swimming pool to the children's playground in Building 6. If you don't know the way, you really have to move four or five times to find the children's playground.
Generally speaking, it is not recommended for families with young children, it should be good to bring the elderly.

name:T‚Äçu‚Äçt‚Äçu‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äço‚Äçm‚Äçi
info:Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Ocean View
info:Stayed in June 2023
info:Couples
info:3 Reviews
rating:4
posted:Posted July 9, 2023
msg:During this Dragon Boat Festival trip, I experienced Haitang Bay Shangri-La Hotel and Fairmont Hotel. When I checked in, the front desk arranged to live upstairs in the spa hall, which was a bit magical.
The hotel housekeeper JUDY sent me a map when I checked in, which played a big role. I don‚Äôt need to get lost between buildings, and I can quickly get the route to the lobby. The hotel's breakfast is very rich. I was very excited when I went to eat it on the first day, and there was a limited number of meals at the door.
Reservations are required for boating and visiting the Wooden Art Museum, as well as for the shuttle bus to the Duty Free City.
The room is not equipped with hand soap or hand sanitizer. I asked the housekeeper to give me a piece of hand soap.
The location of the big bathtub üõÅ on the balcony is so strange. I don‚Äôt know how to use it for guests who need to take a bath? But I don't use hotel bathtubs.
The room was cleaned very carefully, and I found that even my clothes and skirts were folded, hahahaha.
I tried BBQ by the pool, 388 people. To be honest, the quality is mediocre, probably due to too few reservations, especially the quality of white wine at the drink bar is really a bit substandard, and the cost is estimated to be less than 100 yuan. The afternoon tea at Jinzun Building is good value for money, and the Riesling white grape is much better than the dinner BBQ.
The way to the beach is a bit unclear, and there is a lack of manpower to take care of it. Several boardwalks are damaged. It is recommended to go to the beach to step on the water after eight or nine o'clock, it is not hot at all.
Finally, the wooden decoration of the room will have a slightly musty smell in the humid local climate, please pay attention to the guests with a keen sense of smell.
Ctrip paid me a security deposit of more than 4,000 a few weeks in advance, and the hotel paid another 6,000 deposit when I checked in. When I checked out, the room fee was deducted and the rest was refunded to the card. It is somewhat cumbersome and inconvenient for the refund.

posted:Posted May 30, 2023
msg:FAIRMONT: TURNING MOMENTS INTO MEMORIES
Fairmont: "Fei" Fan's holidays are engraved in the memory

The Fairmont Hotel, which has been planted after refurbishment in 2021, will reopen after the epidemic in Sanya in 2022. During the National Day Holiday, we plan to arrange reservations immediately, but the hotel is temporarily requisitioned as an isolation hotel, and the hotel‚Äôs opening hours have been adjusted repeatedly during the long holiday. Due to the delay, we passively changed the ticket again and again, and finally regretted that we missed it and failed to arrange it~

The 2023 Sanya vacation trip will restart and return, and Fairmont will be the first choice no matter what! The last two visits after half a month are also true love
Enjoy: Sanya Fairmont, the most distinctive feature is naturally the world's first seawater rhyme river in the hotel, with a total length of 1200 meters running through the podium of the hotel, pretending to be in Venice. The cruise experience is also among the luxury hotels in Haitang Bay unique! I have been here twice, and each time I arranged to take a dragon boat tour around the Yunhe River during the day and night. The scenery experience is still different, and I am very happy.
Catering: Breakfast at the veranda restaurant, afternoon tea at the lobby bar, and dinner at Yuexuan Chinese Restaurant, all of which basically meet the requirements of picky foodies. Salmon is free for breakfast, this alone is enough to attract salmon lovers! Sanya's top luxury is also the standard breakfast only available at Capella and Park Hyatt. Edison and Rosewood didn‚Äôt get any of them anyway!
Culture: Wooden Art Museum, exhibits and collections include century-old wooden art masterpieces, historic houses, ancient buildings, ancient pavilions, and old photos of old objects in the Republic of China mansion, all of which are engraved with the imprint of time and present cultural heritage.
Jinzun: The second stay in a luxury suite, enjoy the Jinzun executive privileges, including Jinzun afternoon tea, pre-dinner cocktail snacks and all-weather coffee and soft drinks. Of course, there are welcome fruits and a daily mini bar that you can enjoy upon check-in. Eat and drink without worrying about the life of rice insects, you can eat, lie down and play, and feel full of vacation.

posted:Posted April 12, 2023
msg:The deepest impression I have on Sanya Fairmont Hotel is its fantastic castle-style architecture. After the car arrives at the gate, guests must walk through a high nine-hole stone corridor bridge to enter the lobby. The canal under the bridge loops through all six guest house buildings, splitting each one in half. When passing by by boat, I looked up and saw a line of sky. Although the guest room building has only six floors, it looks extremely tall, and the guest rooms seem to be built on the cliff. Looking down from high-rise rooms, the canal is deep and mysterious, especially at night. The guest room building and the main building are connected by water arch bridges and air corridor bridges, forming a complex maze. There are also some antique buildings scattered in the hotel courtyard, such as Shikumen in Shanghai and ancient houses in the south of the Yangtze River. In short, this is a hotel worth savoring carefully. If there are romantic stories and suspense movies choose this place as the background, I think it is very suitable.

msg:I took my parents on a trip at the end of March. I am 30 years old and my parents are 55. It is very difficult to book a room because there are 3 people. I have considered for a long time and chose the duplex garden-view suite at Kaiwei Fairmont in Haitang Bay. The price is right, and there are also There are many activities and special projects. Everyone has visited the attractions, so we are going to play in the hotel. All the attached content is very suitable.

I would like to boast here, because I was afraid that the actual situation would not match the picture, so I called and asked about the layout of the duplex garden view suite I was looking forward to. After confirming that it was two floors with a bed upstairs and downstairs, I was so happy At the same time, I also learned that there can be a big bed upstairs and two small beds downstairs. So satisfied.

VIP4- VIP check-in privileges:
The day before check-in, the service staff of the hotel called me to finalize the check-in needs, personnel composition, room layout, etc. on the day of check-in. The exclusive butler Diana added my vx to follow up with us throughout the check-in time, etc. Feeling that I have been taken care of all the time, I feel relieved a lot with my parents.
When we checked in at 11 am that day, Diana was waiting for us at the front desk of the hotel. When we arrived at the check-in, he told us that the room had been upgraded to a duplex sea view suite, and that it was in Building 6. I was so happy. The view from Building 6 had an amazing sea view . And the room number I arranged is on the same day as my birthday, everything is so lucky.
After checking in, the butler directly arranged for us to board the boat in the hotel, and took photos of the whole family on the boat for us, and checked in to the building where our room is located by boat. very happy.
After arriving at the room, the butler sent me the photos and the map of the hotel, and circled and marked the places that we will be involved in the itinerary. I felt that the work was too detailed.

After arriving at the room, a welcome fruit plate and red wine snacks were delivered, which can be regarded as rich. In short, the fruits are very fresh, but since there are afternoon tea and cocktail parties, there is no chance to open red wine.

Facilities: The room is a duplex design, with a big bed upstairs and downstairs, and there are bathrooms on both floors, which perfectly meets the accommodation needs of our family of three. They do not disturb each other when resting, and there are balconies on both floors. Downstairs is the shower room and upstairs is the bathtub. There are TVs on both floors üì∫.

After contacting the housekeeper in advance for the Jinzun buffet afternoon tea and Jinzun pre-dinner cocktail party, they both gave us a 3-digit sign. These two projects are located on the first floor of Building 4 of the hotel, in the same location. Afternoon tea and drinks are self-service, the heated scones are very fragrant, and the others are similar to other hotels. It is very suitable for chatting with parents. When it was time for the cocktail party, the waiter served us double portions of food based on the number of us. Basically, after eating enough, dinner is almost the same.

In the hotel package, you can also participate in hotel activities and travel photography. After consulting with the butler, he recommended us to go to the golf course to play putting greens. The arrangement was at 1:30 p.m. the next day, so the butler helped me Did a late checkout until 4! It's just so thoughtful.
Travel photography made an appoin**ent with us when we checked in the day before, and asked us about the number of people and our needs. The little brother took the photos very seriously. In the end, I felt that the selection of the film was not satisfactory. I chose 5 free pictures, and the others were not. wanted.
The hotel's breakfast is also very good, especially the big roasted elbow, which has many layers, which makes this brunch very solid haha.
Before checking out, the butler told us that there was a small gift attached. Overall very happy.

There is also a problem in the hotel that the sound insulation of the room is really not good. In the middle of the night, the guest next door brings their children back, and the whole floor can hear it. In addition, there are mosquitoes, and the mosquito repellent measures in the hotel rooms should be increased.

But on the whole, the flaws are not concealed. The whole hotel is ancient and ancient, especially suitable for our friends in their thirties to bring their parents to spend a few days on vacation. I regret that I didn't arrange a few more days here. Will come to live next time. Especially with a big family there is also a great solution. Like Like!

All the services I experienced in the hotel proved that I chose Fairmont too correctly, and all the happiness starts from the moment of check-in.
On the first day of check-in, the staff at the children's pool we went to will take the initiative to send swimming rings to the children. Generally, hotels have to ask for it by themselves. Seeing me scratching my legs and handing me mosquito repellent water, this kind of caring is really unexpected and pleasantly surprised.
In the evening, I went to the western restaurant and just sat down a foreign chef came over to say hello to each table. Ms. Li Jijin asked us what we wanted to eat. We didn‚Äôt order after reading the menu. Ms. Li Knowing that on the first day of our stay, we were afraid that we would not be able to find our way. He was very considerate and sent us all the way to Jinzun. After learning that I had been bitten by midges a lot, he asked the waiter to share the grass oin**ent for me to use.
I met Ms. Chen Yamei at the Jinzun afternoon tea. She gave me the green grass oin**ent. She was also bitten by midges very badly. We are both sick friends. We exchanged a lot of small methods on how to relieve itching and treat it. We had dinner at Jinzun In the past few days, Ms. Chen has been very caring and responsive to our service.
At the same time, I also met a manager Mr. Sun Bin in Jinzun. When he learned that we needed boxes for packing and express delivery, he tried hard to find them in the warehouse, but he went to other places to help us find a particularly suitable box. When he couldn‚Äôt find it, he told the customer that there was no more, but he didn‚Äôt say he couldn‚Äôt find it, but he tried his best to help us solve the problem. He was really touched by the fact that he took the customer‚Äôs needs seriously. The first time I met him, I told him that the hotel‚Äôs breakfast was very good. It was the best among the hotels we stayed in Haitang Bay.
During the stay in the store, the two staff members, Mr. Li and Mr. Ye, who took the children to participate in surfing and tree climbing activities and led the children to play together, were very patient with the children and would remember the names of the children when they met in other areas of the hotel.
Captain Long and Captain Fu will take us on a boat and will introduce us to the various areas of the hotel. People like me who love to ask questions can also patiently answer them.
During our stay, due to time constraints, we failed to catch up with the explanation of the Wooden Art Museum. The curator Minnie specially arranged for me to explain for nearly an hour on the day we left the store, explaining every collection in the exhibition hall in detail. It's great to expand a lot of new and interesting knowledge. It's a pity that our time is limited and I can't finish it. When I was listening to the explanation, there were little brothers from the art museum who helped me take care of the children throughout the whole process.
There are also many staff members with good service who don‚Äôt remember their names. For example, the two waiters and one girl at the private room for 4 people in the private room of the Chinese restaurant service hall during dinner time on 4.25 are also very meticulous and know how to think from the perspective of customers and give considerate services. suggestion.
Every staff member who serves attentively deserves to be remembered and seen! Such a big hotel with so many employees can make every link of the staff so caring and friendly to customers, which shows that the management of the hotel is really hardworking.
Very pleasant two-day stay experience, from the service, environment, meals, everything is very satisfied!

msg:This time I stayed in Fairmont for 2 days and was upgraded to a sea view room for free. The overall feeling is very good. The decoration style of the hotel is more Chinese and Southeast Asian, and the lobby is well decorated. The entire hotel forms a fan-shaped structure with the lobby as the center and the guest rooms on both sides. The beautiful butler Nimo communicated with us to understand the check-in situation one day before check-in, and arranged the room to make the check-in process very fast. The beautiful butler helped us solve many problems during the entire stay, and gave us a small gift when we left the store. The hotel also sent fruit and snacks, and coconuts were delivered to the room every day. The room is fairly spacious, with a large balcony and comfortable bedding. There is an outdoor swimming pool and a large lawn, the hotel environment is very green, but the trail leading to the beach needs maintenance. The hotel's breakfast is rich in variety and tastes good. The biggest feature of the hotel is to take a small boat tour around the small canal around the hotel, and the architectural museum in the hotel. Captain Bruce Lee and the captain of the fleet who drove the boat introduced in detail the architectural features of the hotel and the origin of the museum during the tour. From this, you can feel the cultural heritage of the hotel.

msg:This is an unforgettable resort and leisure hotel with distinctive garden landscape and architectural design.
Taking a cruise ship to shuttle between the various buildings of the hotel is like wandering in the water city of Venice, admiring the scenery on both sides of the river, distinctive buildings, covered bridges...
The hotel has its own beach, a 10-minute walk, with several rows of beach chairs for rest.
The rooms are Chinese-style and large in size, and the wicker chairs on the terrace are comfortable. I really enjoy reading on the terrace.
There are many wood carving elements in the hotel, and the covered bridges are ancient and quaint. Friends who like to take pictures will definitely make a big movie.
The breakfast is rich in variety, and there are three places where coffee can be enjoyed nearby.

Here I must thank summer for her warm and thoughtful service, contacting us every day, very heartwarming! Also requested an extra bed and breakfast for us.

All in all, it is a wonderful hotel experience. It is recommended that the customer should choose whether to play guzheng music or not when boarding the boat.
I prefer to listen to the sound of gurgling water and birdsong from nature.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Garden View
info:Stayed in September 2023
info:Family
info:2 Reviews
rating:1.7
posted:Posted September 15, 2023
msg:I consider myself a very peaceful person, but this time I was disturbed by this hotel. Let me start with the conclusion: the hotel has some special activities that are relatively interesting, but they are very unsuitable for small family trips; the basic service staff are very nice, but the overall management training of the hotel is poor.

Problem 1: The so-called butler service communication is very confusing.
My wife and son stayed at this hotel for two days. The day before check-in, the hotel housekeeper called me to ask about the check-in time, check-in requirements and other related matters. I replied that I could check in at about one o'clock because I have a one and a half year old. My baby hopes to have an L-shaped bed rail, but has no other requirements. I thought it was a surprise because I booked this hotel on the recommendation of a friend who said the boat cruise and bonfire show were interesting. We didn't come here just for the service.
But when we checked in at about 1:30 the next day, there was no housekeeper at the front desk. After we completed the formalities, we were told that the general room check-in time is 3 pm. Since we arrived earlier, we would try our best to arrange it. Although we felt that checking in at three in the afternoon was a bit unreasonable, we respected the hotel's rules and the hotel also prepared drinks and cookies in the lounge, so we happily went. But the air conditioning in the lounge was too cold, and we were worried about our children catching a cold, so we were wandering around the hotel. Then we received a WeChat message from the housekeeper saying that the room was ready, and we rushed to the front desk. After arriving at the front desk, the guy who had just handled the formalities for us and the young lady next to us were confused and refused to respond to our questions. It was not until the housekeeper called me again and said she was at the front desk opposite that I exploded. The sweltering weather and ineffective communication made me very angry.
The same thing happened with the dragon boat reservation later. The butler said the reservation was made, and the second confirmation also said it was ok. However, when we arrived at the pier, we didn't have our reservation form, and we waited in the Sanya sunshine for half an hour.
Although the leader of the butler later called to apologize, I feel that if the personnel were not well trained, they would not have to provide butler service. It would raise the expectations of the guests and not be able to handle the problem well, which is very funny.

Question 2: Hotel design
The hotel is surrounded by a river, which actually has some characteristics, but the design of three steps, one bridge, and five steps, one step, made us who are used to carrying children in strollers experience a triathlon. The main venue facilities such as parking area, lobby, swimming pool, beach, and breakfast restaurant are far away, and the journey is arduous and makes people speechless.

Question 3: Room air conditioning
Maybe we didn't understand the operation of the air conditioner, but the operation panel clearly showed that it was closed, and the air outlet stopped blowing air. It would not be long before the air conditioner would automatically turn on, causing my wife and I to grab the quilt and wrap ourselves tightly every morning. , unfortunately I lost a bit and now have a bad cold.

But in fact, there are many hotels in Sanya. What some people think are disadvantages may be advantages in the eyes of others. I hope my real experience can give some information to other friends.
I also hope that the hotel friends will not need to contact me because of this comment. I fully recognize your attitude and efforts, but it is true that you have not been able to satisfy us. I hope you can learn from this and serve other guests well.
----------------------------------------

Occasionally, there will be one or two businesses that may not be familiar with, and it will be a little slower. The service quality in other aspects is very good! The hotel room is large, there are round lounge chairs on the balcony, and you can have a drink at night. The sanitation is spotless, even if it is a bit slow to notify the cleaning, they may not be able to stay busy when the room is full. The facilities are quite satisfactory, after all, it has been open for many years. The hotel is very close to the beach, you can go directly to the beach along the direction of the swimming pool, passing a large lawn in the middle. The biggest highlight of this hotel is taking a gondola boat along the river to surround the hotel, especially the feeling of Venice Water City. The scenery along the sides of the river is beautiful, which is very suitable for taking pictures and punching cards. There are many people, and you can wait in line according to the room number. The hotel has a rich variety of breakfasts, both Chinese and Western dim sum dishes, as well as Hainanese special Bao Luo noodles, all of which taste quite good, but there are still many people who need to queue up. Now that the epidemic situation is released, people from Northeast China and big families from the North China Plain are all coming to Sanya Yes, I can hear a pure Northeast accent everywhere, it feels like we have arrived at a tourist attraction in the northü§≠ü§≠
The overall feeling of the hotel is good, it is recommended to stay!

1. The front desk is poor: I came to check in at 12 o'clock and was informed that there were no vacancies and had to wait until 3 o'clock, so I had no choice but to accept it. But the open lobby was very hot, and I could only endure it by squeezing on the sofa. During this period, no service staff came to comfort and explain, or informed me of the check-in time, and they didn't even ask if I wanted a glass of water. I had no choice but to store my luggage and go to a restaurant outside to eat and enjoy the cool weather. When it was 3 o'clock, I asked the front desk and was shocked to hear that no room had been cleaned out, so I had to continue waiting without any explanation or comfort. Didn't check in until 3:40. This is a dereliction of duty at the front desk.

2. Concierge: After obtaining the room card, go to the concierge to collect the stored luggage. But neither inside nor outside the lobby was found. I really can't imagine what kind of service capabilities can lead to a guest's luggage being lost in just two or three hours! During this period, some service staff suggested that we go back to the room to rest and wait for them to find our luggage. So we went to the guest room, but thinking about the missing items made us really worried and angry. Half an hour later, my luggage was recovered. I asked why and the answer was: it was sent to someone else's room by mistake! This is a dereliction of duty on the part of the concierge.

3. Poor guest rooms: The room facilities are good, but the sanitary condition is worrying. There are still crumbs of biscuits on the footrest in front of the bed. The floor was dirty and sticky. After reporting it to the front desk, we were told that the housekeeping staff could come back to clean the room and were willing to provide us with executive lounge benefits as compensation. We reluctantly accept it. This is a dereliction of duty on the part of the guest room staff.

4. Poor food and beverage: I went to the lounge at 5:30 and was told that the happy hour was not a buffet, but only provided a plate of snacks - a few pieces of cake, fried lotus root slices, fried spring rolls, nothing else! In a five-star hotel, the executive lounge‚Äôs happy hour didn‚Äôt even have hot dishes, and there was no wine list, no cocktails, only a pitiful amount of canned beer, Coke, Sprite and other drinks! It‚Äôs hard to believe that Fairmont is such a substandard product! This is a dereliction of duty in the catering industry!

Summary: Fairmont is flashy and vain. In just one day, I witnessed the failure of the front desk, concierge, guest rooms, and catering, which is really unacceptable. Will not stay at any Fairmont hotels in the future!
