msg:Strong Amway! I'm going to start seriously reviewing
After the Spring Festival holiday, I temporarily decided to go to Sanya to play before my children started school. I first considered Yanlord. If I didn‚Äôt book No. 3, I thought about finding a convenient hotel in Haitang Bay. I just saw Fairmont, didn't make a strategy for the hotel, just ordered a room without breakfast, and added it when I thought about it.
A lot of surprises~
The day before the check-in, I contacted me in advance about the number of people staying and the situation of the personnel. The next day, I went to Sanya butler to add me on WeChat and send me the hotel activity list.
When I arrived at the store at 2:30, I was first impressed by the hotel's environmental experience. It was built around the river. I put down my luggage and checked in. When the ID card was given, I was told that the room had been arranged and I could go live directly. Upgraded me to a sea view room, and gave me two breakfasts. During this Spring Festival holiday, the hotel has a lot of fans~
Next, I entered the room, prepared fruits and pastries, and gave chicken soup at night. The facilities are very new. The oversized bathtub is on the balcony, and there is a wood-carved desk, all of which are the characteristics of the hotel's own style, so I won't describe them here~
The hotel housekeeper added WeChat to send me the activity list before coming, and immediately arranged for us to participate in the Little Chef activity at 3:00 üë®‚Äçüç≥, it was a great activity, and the time was just right, not too rushed.
Later we will go to the cruise ship of the hotel. During the cruise, the little brother will introduce the situation of the hotel, where and what to do. He is very considerate and has done every detail. I also went to the Wood Sculpture Art Museum. I suggest that everyone have time to visit and feel it up close. It is really a work of art that can be touched.
Next to the art gallery is the golf driving range, which is very beautiful and suitable for taking pictures.
We didn't participate in other activities, because the time is relatively tight~ If you have enough time, you can calm down and visit the hotel. The baby is more interested in the beach, and the hotel also provides sand digging tools, so you don‚Äôt need to bring it yourself~ There is a helipad on the way to the beach, and you can also take picturesüì∑. Stay at home, experience the happiness of the hotel
Later, when we stayed in Yanlord, Yanlord was full of rooms, and the experience would be discounted. We didn‚Äôt have enough time to experience Yanlord‚Äôs children‚Äôs activities. Each has its own advantages, but if I go to Sanya again, I will still choose Fairmont to stay again~

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Fairmont Duplex Family Suite Ocean View
info:Stayed in October 2022
info:Family
info:15 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted October 22, 2022
msg:1. Hotel environment: The overall style design is really diverse. The exterior of the building is Mediterranean style, and the interior decoration is atypical Chinese design + Balinese style. The courtyard landscape has some Southeast Asian flavors, and it also mixes old houses in Ming and Qing Dynasties. I really can‚Äôt find a second one in Sanya. I don‚Äôt know if the designer has a clear idea or the Boss has too many ideas, but after adding the elements of artificial canals and wharfs, there seems to be a connection between the multiple styles, and the sense of discord has also faded. .
2. Service: This is the biggest highlight of this stay experience. Before check-in, the guest relations starry called in advance to communicate their needs and arranged the room. During the check-in period, they responded to their needs and responded quickly. Although the number of diners has dropped sharply due to the impact of the epidemic, the service has not been reduced. , especially the meticulous and warm and thoughtful service provided by Executive Sous Chef Tom Wang and Food and Beverage Wei Wei to the children, we are very satisfied! Almost all the hotel service staff I have contacted maintain a well-trained hospitality standard. Like the Sofitel hotel I stayed in before, it seems that Accor's professionalism is still in the same strain!
3. Links to be improved: The overall landscape design level of the hotel's courtyard is average, especially the central lawn and trails adjacent to the sea are quite cramped, the villa areas on the left and right sides are planned in a disorderly manner, and a large part of the architectural style does not match the hotel building facade, and Occupying the area of greenery and trails, all the hotels in Haitang Bay that I have stayed in before have area plans for villa areas, but none of them have grown in disorder like Fairmont. Although the hotel has only opened for more than a year, the roof and outdoor facilities of the building are slightly worn out. I don't know why? Many parts of the public area of the hotel are filled with real estate marketing advertisements, which is a bit deviating from the a**osphere of the resort hotel.
In general, Fairmont's inherent quality is still basically maintained, but there are also some links that have been blended with Chinese characteristics...

name:f‚Äçe‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçx‚Äçw‚Äçj
info:Fairmont Gold Room, Lounge Access, 1 King Bed Ocean View
info:Stayed in June 2022
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 29, 2022
msg:Detailed review of Fairmont Sanya Haitang Bay (Garden View Duplex Suite)

1. Overview | Overview
The hotel's comprehensive recommendation index is five stars! I am an Accor Platinum member, ota superimposed with Sanya consumption coupons to book a three-night Fairmont Gold Bottle Sea View King Room, call the hotel affiliate member in advance, and upgrade to a garden view duplex suite when I arrive at the store.
The biggest highlight of the hotel is the high cost performance, the excellent products and services of Jinzun Lounge, as well as the canal and gondola cruise around the six buildings. As well as the mixed living of the hotel and the villas sold, the privacy is not strong. In addition, the two high-rise buildings next to the hotel (Poly Rosewood and Waldorf Astoria) are also incompatible with the hotel style.

2. Room | In Room
The entire hotel consists of the lobby and six main hotel buildings. Buildings 1, 3, and 5 are on the left side of the lobby, and buildings 2, 4, and 6 are on the right. Among them, five or six buildings are closest to the sea, but the owner took five buildings back and packaged them into serviced apar**ents. The project is for sale...
The most interesting point of the hotel is that an artificial canal is designed to run through all the main hotel buildings. The canal passes through the middle of each building, so each building is actually composed of two slab buildings with corridors in the middle.
After I arrived at the store, I was told to upgrade to a duplex suite with garden view. I was a little unhappy when I heard that there was no sea view at first, and asked if I could downgrade to the originally booked Jinzun sea view room, but the front desk told me that the original room type was full. It's so beautiful, and I quickly said that the whole hotel is far from the sea because of its low floor. Even the sea view room has a very general sea view, and the duplex suite with garden view for me can actually see the sea.
It was already late, so I took my luggage and went to my room. The room was located on the sixth floor (top floor) of Building No. 4.
As soon as you enter the door, there is a walkway, the guest guard on the right, the stairs on the left, and the living room sofa and writing desk. Opposite the sofa is a painted TV cabinet, and there is an irregular-shaped balcony outside the living room. There are many decorative partitions outside the downstairs balcony, and the eaves upstairs are shading, resulting in poor lighting in the living room.
Take the stairs to the second floor, the lighting is much better, because the balcony on the second floor is a terrace, the overhead is not blocked, and you can see a little side sea view from the balcony and bed, the overall layout of the second floor is very compact, and the open master bathroom is on the right when you come up , the single basin is facing the big bed, there is only a roller blind in the middle, and the bathtub can only be placed on the terrace.
The whole room is decorated in traditional Chinese style, using a lot of wooden furniture. It felt very ordinary at first, but after two days of living, it felt okay. The duplex structure is also very suitable for families with children. Adults and children can each occupy one. The layers do not interfere with each other. In addition, although the large bathtub on the terrace is not very private, it is still very pleasant to take a bath when the weather is good and watch the sea and clouds. Anyway, as long as you are not embarrassed, it is others...

3. Dining | Dining
Jinzun Lounge is located on the first floor of Building No. 4. Currently, there is no breakfast. Drinks, biscuits and red wine are available from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm, afternoon tea from 2:00 pm to 4:00 pm, and happy hour from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm! The overall Jinzun Lounge experience is very good. It can be said that it is one of the best lounges I have experienced in Sanya and even in China. The afternoon tea desserts are of high quality, and there are fried chicken nuggets and other food that children like to eat. Happy hours are all Small plates of fine food, as well as delicious silky soup and six freshly brewed cocktails.
The breakfast restaurant is located in the cafeteria on the first floor of the lobby. The most eye-catching is the escalator leading from the restaurant to the lobby. There are many kinds of breakfast, including three kinds of freshly squeezed juices, honeycomb honey, many hot dishes, and many meat choices. I went earlier and didn't see the legendary freshly made pineapple buns. 6

4. Facilities | Facilities
The hotel's main facilities are located on the first floor of Building 6, such as a spa center, children's playground and gym, and there is a children's reading center on the second floor.
There are only three swimming pools, namely the lagoon swimming pool on the first floor of Building 6 (connected to the pool room), the children's swimming pool (small) and the main swimming pool next to it. I personally feel that there is no adult swimming pool. .
There is also a mini golf course next to the lobby, and the hotel also has a wooden culture exhibition hall.

5. Unforgettable moments | the Moments
The experience of staying in this hotel is very fragmented. On the one hand, the style of the hotel room is very Chinese, but the appearance of the hotel and the canal gondola are very exotic. The hotel hardware is very old, but the service staff is full of vitality. Feeling young, the interior of the hotel creates a strong sense of vacation, but there is a circle of roads and villas open to the outside world around the hotel. There are two high-rise buildings next to it, and even the fifth building, which is closest to the sea, is being renovated and sold... ‚Ä¶
It can only be said that AccorHotels has been trying to rebuild this hotel, but some of its own flaws doom it that this hotel will not become a classic.
Of course, when the weather is good, taking a gondola at the hotel pier and taking ten minutes to travel around the hotel is still a very strange experience. It is worth visiting this hotel for this.

6. Conclusion | Conclusion
Because of the ultra-low price (more than 700 a night) to stay in a Jinzun King Room and a free upgrade to a garden-view duplex suite, I personally feel that it is almost the same as living in white. , is definitely the king of cost performance in Haitang Bay!
----------------------------------------

name:B‚Äçi‚Äçh‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçl‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçt‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äçu‚Äçm‚Äçu
info:Fairmont King, 1 King Size Bed Ocean View
info:Stayed in June 2022
info:Couples
info:31 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted June 11, 2022
msg:Fairmont is not actually a new hotel, it was Kempinski at first, then Wanda, but when Fairmont took over, it can indeed be described as "new"! From the dilapidated feeling of the landscaping at the beginning, but today's greenery, compact and orderly, we can see the "new" created by Fairmont.

Not to mention the improvement of the external environment, the service is even more closely followed. Whether it is the front desk concierge or the room cleaning, they all show a sense of friendly service.

This can be vividly reflected in the warm message from the waiter Ye Yumiao after meticulously cleaning the room, as well as the warm reception and accompanying check-in by Judy in the lobby and the warm farewell when leaving the hotel.

Of course, the most important thing to stay in a hotel is to stay in hardware, and this one is also remarkable. The interior of the room is exquisite and stable, which is absolutely in line with the five-star positioning. The pool isn't much, but it's big enough, and things like lap skates are free to use. The variety of breakfast is also above the standard, and the quality is acceptable. The museums and river boats add some entertainment.

Okay, so much has been said, but there are also some small places, which are a little regrettable. Although it is a sea view room, due to the overall low height of the building, most of the visible sea is blocked by trees. It is estimated that the top floor can achieve a real sea view.

In any case, this four-day-three-night experience was perfect.

posted:Posted July 8, 2022
msg:I bought the two-night Jinzun Garden View Room package sold by Ctrip, and the overall experience was great!
Thank you Manager Zhao Yinglu for his thoughtful arrangement. She arranged the check-in for us in advance. It was because my diving get out of class was late and I didn‚Äôt enjoy it. If there were any problems during the check-in period, I would help us solve them in a timely manner. They were very considerate and the service was very good for us. The experience, before leaving, he came to see us, gave us gifts, helped us pour delicious coconut milk, thank you very much!
In terms of food and drink, I stayed for two nights and two days for breakfast, and experienced the ordinary breakfast in the veranda and the breakfast in the Golden Lounge. There will be many people on the veranda, so go early to avoid queuing. I went directly after watching the sunrise. There are many varieties and good quality. Both Chinese and Western styles are very complete, and the Ming stalls are also very rich. Going early is a good overall experience. The breakfast variety in the Jinzun Lounge is a little less, but it is very delicate. Many of them will be delivered directly to the waiter. Basically, there are all the things you want to eat in the veranda. Even if you go a little late, you still have to wait for a few minutes. Jinzun's afternoon tea is also very rich, there are salty desserts and fried foods, and all kinds of drinks are also rich. There are not many people going early in Happy Hour, and the variety is relatively rich. There is not much time to experience it in a hurry and go to work. The room is in Building 3, and it takes a few minutes to walk to the Jinzun Executive Lounge. The corridor is a little hot.
The hotel has its own beach, which is very beautiful. Haitang Bay is not allowed to go into the sea. Fairmont is facing Wuzhizhou Island. The weather in the east is good and you can watch the sunrise.
The room is not small, but the water for washing hands often splashes out, the water on the ground is a little slippery, some equipment in the room is a little old, and others are fine
There may be no seats in the parking lot at night. The security guards will help you find a place intimately. After checking in, the concierge can help arrange the shuttle bus and the waiter to help with the luggage. The service is also very good.
Guests who stay in the hotel can experience the hotel gondola. The boating staff is very enthusiastic and helped to take a lot of beautiful photos. They will guide us to pose and explain that the murals are Big Fish Begonia and Sanya Lucheng. The service is very good.
The package also included a full meal, which I had no time to eat. I ate it before I left at noon on the last day, and also gave fried rice and desserts. I had to catch the plane before I could finish it. The waiter helped me pack the bag and I took it on the plane to eat. Yes, Xiang fainted the passenger on the side hahaha
The hotel should also have a lot of parent-child activities. I haven't experienced it. I saw a lot of children. It should be good.
I'll come here next time I have a chance~

The promenade has an important practical function. It is not only used as a decorative structure for a building, but also used to connect or display the most beautiful scenery in the garden. Even in weather that is not suitable for staying outdoors, such as hot sun or heavy rain, the promenade still attracts people to stroll or take a nap. The promenade, with its slender lines, moving rhythm, interweaving light and shadow, and changing scenery, endows the garden with a unified and vivid character. The promenade extending from the main hall hugs the patio garden like an arm; the promenade built along the lake or facing the distant view adopts the method of borrowing scenery to show different scenery through changing frames.

As the flagship store of Accor Group in Greater China, every staff member is very attentive and professional, making people feel particularly comfortable in many small details. This time I took the second old man on a trip. The staff service of this hotel made my parents full of praise, and they talked about coming to this hotel next time! Let‚Äôs talk about food: Although the buffet breakfast variety is not ‚Äútreasure‚Äù, it basically meets all kinds of needs. The point is, the production is remarkable. There is no particular case of stepping on the thunder in terms of taste. But it may be the Dragon Boat Festival, the restaurant is crowded on the first day of the holiday, and the service can't keep up with a little during peak hours. But even during particularly busy times, every waiter is very responsive and responsive. Talk about the room: re-examination of the sea view family room, two floors up and down, each with a double bed. There is nothing wrong with the layout, but it is obvious that the first floor was originally a living room, and a shower room was added to the balcony during the later decoration, which is a little crude and embarrassing. At the same time, the layout of the room has been changed, but each light switch button has not been changed accordingly, resulting in the switch button not matching the logo (it can be seen that it is still an old switch). And, the mattress is a bit soft...it's really soft...I feel that my back hurts when I slept when I was young...not to mention my parents...I hope this can be improved. Toiletries are what I want to complain about. As a flagship store, toiletries (especially toothbrushes) are not even comparable to budget hotels such as Atour. Seems to have lost a bit of Fairmont's identity. Talking about the cultural heritage: What attracted my attention to Fairmont was that it rebuilt Du Yuesheng's mansion from Shanghai to Sanya, and a pair of pavilions from the late Qing Dynasty. But after the real check-in and participating in the cultural tour of the hotel, I realized that the cultural heritage of the hotel is far more than that. The wood-carved frescoes in the hotel lobby and the ceiling of the nine-story tower are worth talking about for half an hour. Instantly, the favorability of the owner Kaiwei Group is unlimited‚ûï1. Talk about travel photography: no comparison, no harm! Two years ago, I came to Sanya no less than ten times, and the travel photographer has also dealt with it several times. Only the photographer brother (name: Zhang Yi) in Fairmont this time, yes! It's just to name and praise üëç professional! Extremely patient! At noon, our family of three felt that the sun was not good enough. He also patiently guided the photo poses one by one. It took nearly 2 hours before and after, and changed five or six scenes, from the hotel lobby to the promenade, yes. Pavilion, and then to the garden, woods, beach... without the slightest impatience. And the production rate is very high! Let his mother, who has always been seldom praised, be full of praise for him! I directly invited him to Guangzhou to help a group of old sisters take cheongsam photos! Haha üòÑ In addition, we must also name and praise the little brother Ther who received us at the front desk of the hotel when we checked in. Help us to solve the problems we encountered, even if it is not his time on duty, he will help us contact the responsible colleagues as soon as possible. What a handsome and warm little brother üíïüíØ. Well, this is the first time I've written such a detailed review. Really feel good ha! Everyone I met on the trip was very nice, and it made my trip with my parents more comfortable and happier. Thanks for meeting!

msg:The first stop of my honeymoon in Sanya with my wife, the experience of this hotel can be said to be beyond my expectations. Let‚Äôs summarize from the following aspects:
Infrastructure: The hotel is so big that I got lost twice, but call the front desk to get the cable car to pick it up. Things like swimming pools and private beaches are standard. Surrounded by the biggest characteristic river in the whole hotel, there is a feeling of being in Venice. The hotel also provides a free dragon boat surround service, the beautiful scenery is unobstructed, and you can take various photos.
Room facilities: We stayed in the deluxe sea view room, the room is very large, as for the sea view, we may owe a little bit. The decoration style in the guest room is a bit Southeast Asian, and there are luxurious wood carvings everywhere. Although a permanent resident may not be able to adapt to this style, you must come and experience it. The hotel also provides welcome fruit, mini bar and Baisuishan (many bottles) that can't be drunk at all, which is a plus in my heart anyway.
Hotel meals: Breakfast is from 7-11, so there is no need to worry about getting up late and not being able to keep up with breakfast. The buffet breakfast is very good. Before I came here, I read a lot of online sayings that the breakfast was very general. After my own experience, I felt that it was very good. It has everything, and the desserts tasted good too.
Hotel service: Before I came, Diana at the front desk of the hotel also added my WeChat and asked me if there was any special day for my stay, and then specially sent us a honeymoon cake (my wife said that it tasted good from a professional point of view). Then check-in, from you to the front desk to the room, there are staffs to help you carry luggage and guide you. The people who introduced the projects and services inside the hotel are also very professional and have very clear ideas. Diana also gave us a very thoughtful before leaving a small gift.
Overall, although this hotel is not a big fire, it gave me a lot of surprises. It is much better than the 5-star hotel I stayed in later. It is recommended that if you come to Haitang Bay in Sanya, you must experience this unique "Oriental" Venice" Hotel.

The writing table in the room where I live is a woodcarving painting of "Huxi Thatched Cottage" by Wen Zhengming, a great genius of the Peng Dynasty, which is extremely fine. Even more peculiar is the carving on the roof of the hotel lobby, which is as exquisite as the dome of the Taihe Hall of the Forbidden City in Beijing. The Yunhe River in the hotel is even more unique. Taking a gondola boat for a week is like being in Venice. Apart from that, what impressed me the most was the service of the hotel. Judy from the Guest Relations Depar**ent was particularly warm and thoughtful. She called a day in advance to inquire when she would arrive at the store and what her needs were. Thank you again for Judy's attentive, professional and meticulous service!

The design of the hotel is very special, from the choice of indoor fragrance, to the guest name displayed on the screen in each room, as well as the on-call service, the unique Venice gondola boat tour, the wooden courtyard in the middle and late Qing Dynasty Overall migration display. All reflect the character of this hotel. It's relatively cold these days, and you can't go into the water. There is only one small pool in the whole hotel, which is a hot spring, which is suitable for children to bubble. There is free coconut jelly to eat in the afternoon. In the evening, you can listen to the resident singers in the lobby and have a drink. The bed in the bedroom is big and comfortable, and there is toilet water on the bedside table, which smells of ginger. The breakfast is very rich, a combination of Chinese and Western. There are so many to choose from that a day's brunch is enough. The waves here are relatively large, so it is not suitable for diving. During the day, I take a boat in the hotel and walk on the beach. There are food courts and duty-free shops nearby, 5-10 minutes by car. Before leaving, the little housekeeper also gave a souvenir, with the warmth of home. If you come to Haitang Bay, you must stay here.

Although vacationing in Sanya is a normal part of my life, and I experience different hotels every year, Fairmont likes it from the bottom of my heart and will choose it often.
üöó Transportation: It is more convenient to come by car.
üßπ Hygiene: First class.

msg:There are many luxury hotels in Haitang Bay in Sanya. The reason why I chose Fairmont Kaiwei is that it has been ranked among the world-class luxury hotel brands, and its main feature is guest-oriented and considerate service! I bought a two-night hotel garden-view room discount package on Ctrip two months in advance (including Dragon Boat afternoon tea, free in-room refrigerator cold drinks, etc.). When I checked in, I added 1,300 yuan to upgrade the sea view suite of 100 square meters for two nights, and also upgraded the "Golden Zun" service. Guests who enjoy the service of Jinzun can have breakfast in Jinzun Restaurant (the number of diners is much less than that in the lobby restaurant on the first floor of the hotel). Breakfast includes salted salmon, raw ham, freshly ground coffee and other large restaurants. The special meals can be enjoyed in the outdoor garden. Jin Zun Restaurant also offers afternoon tea from 2:00 to 4:00, and happy hour bar service from 5:00 to 7:00 in the evening. There are a variety of special cocktails for tasting, warmly recommended and carefully arranged by the foreman Chen Yuanyuan of the restaurant Next, our rich family tasted "Bloody Mary" and other specialty cocktails. Fairmont Kaiwei also spent a lot of money to transplant the Du Yuesheng Mansion 100 years ago from Shanghai Beach. In addition, the dragon boat afternoon tea here is also very unique. Sitting in a dragon boat like a boat in the water city of Venice, Italy, enjoying the hotel scenery while having a refreshment, the harvest is not only a good mood, but also a magical time and space... Finally, I want to say that when choosing a hotel, don't follow the crowd, choose the right one, not the expensive one! Choosing Fairmont Kaiwei, which opened only in July this year, at the luxury level of 2,000 yuan per night, the guests get the "golden-class" exalted experience, which definitely exceeds the feeling of staying in Atlantis!

This hotel has changed hands several times and has been remodeled by different owners. Now it has three styles: Venice, ancient China and Southeast Asia. The hotel is very large. There are canals between the buildings. You can ride dragon boats casually. If you have the strength, you can also row by yourself. The hotel and Wuzhizhou Island faces each other across the sea. The quality of the sea water is good, but it is a little far from the beach. There is a big lawn in the middle, but walking can help digestion. If you can‚Äôt walk, there is also a battery car. Afternoon tea is the best among the three meals. It has a lot more varieties than Shangri-La and Grand Hyatt. It not only has a variety of sweet and savory dishes, but also sweet soup, and it is self-service. It also provides wine. Compared with Ritz-Carlton, except It's almost sold, but the others win.

msg:I like to stay in hotels, especially garden hotels with good greenery. I recently wanted to take my children to Sanya. I saw that ** is a popular hotel with a good environment, so I wanted to try it. After all, I heard that it is the flagship in Greater China. store, I ordered a group purchase on Ctrip, and the price was right. Let me talk about my feelings. When I got there, I walked through the long corridor to the lobby. The lobby was very beautiful, especially the high roof. It was so beautiful. Feng shui was used in the decoration of the entire lobby. The ice cream next to the lobby was delicious. When I checked in at the front desk, I met the check-in staff named Angel. I originally thought that the check-in service would be normal. However, after Angel got to know our two families, he helped us arrange similar rooms. However, we happened to meet the company hotel employee. Yes, the occupancy rate is too high and the room is always full. She tried her best to help us arrange a similar room. Later, she added me on WeChat and always told me to contact her if I need anything. She also actively helped us change rooms. A few days later, a friend came over and helped my friend upgrade to a parent-child suite. Knowing that the child was bitten by mosquitoes, he also helped us find medicine. The service was really more than just words and exceeded my expectations. I went to Sanya and stayed at the Ritz-Carlton in Yalong Bay before. The service made me feel great. I didn't expect that the service quality of this newly opened Fairmont is also very high, which makes us very satisfied. Let‚Äôs talk about the rooms. They are large, clean and beautiful. Even the most basic garden view rooms are large and beautiful, especially the large terraces with large lounge chairs. Sanya‚Äôs weather and environment are very suitable for enjoying the scenery from the large terraces. . The twin bed is 1.2 meters, which is indeed a little crowded for bringing children, and the bed is also a little soft. The country advocates having more children. I think the hotel bedding facilities should be greatly improved in the future, which is a strong condition to enhance competitiveness. . The hotel is very big, and there is a canal surrounding the hotel. I was interested before going there, but after doing the boat ride, it became so-so because the water quality is not very good. It would be better if it could be replaced by a swimming pool so that everyone could swim. However, the landscaping is very good, the trees are lush, there are modern restaurants, ancient buildings, and a wooden museum. The museum is a two-entry courtyard, full of good things, and it feels so rich. There is a golf course next to the museum. The hotel is not far from the seaside. You can reach it after passing the swimming pool and walking through a large green grassland. There is a large swimming pool in the center of the hotel. It happened to be a typhoon at the time when I went. It was a bit cold and I couldn't go into the water. It was too Pity. There is a small children's pool and slide next to it, which is a bit smaller. Regarding breakfast, I would like to make a few comments. Compared with hotels of the same level, the hotel's breakfast varieties are a little less varied, and they are not changed every day. The hotel has an executive restaurant. Although there are few people, I think the breakfast varieties are a bit small, so I still go there. The big restaurant has more. I like all kinds of noodles from Hainan. The Baoluo noodles in the big restaurant are so delicious when paired with braised pork and yellow lantern chili sauce. By the way, there is no need to order lunch or dinner in the group-buying hotel. It is not very delicious. Afternoon tea is okay. The key point is that the environment is so good that I don‚Äôt have the intention to eat it. A few people sit there and watch the children play. Having fun is also a kind of enjoyment. I hope we will meet again after the epidemic passes. By then, I hope the breakfast will be richer and Fairmont can give me a bigger surprise.

msg:Late praise, to be honest, this is the first time I have written such a long review.

Due to the epidemic, the goal of Sanya once a quarter has not been achieved, but it is still a little excited to be able to usher in the first Sanya New Year's Eve. Generally speaking, when you come to Sanya, you will choose Haitang Bay, so the hotels around Haitang Bay can be said to stay along the coastline. The reason for choosing Fairmont this time is that the distance to Linwang Night Market, Fengqing Street, Duty Free Shops, 68 and 301 hospitals is all close and moderate. It is also said that it is a new hotel (in fact, it is a new one). You can also check in by boat. Got it. I would like to comment specifically and hope to give other children's shoes a reference~

1. Advantages of the hotel:
1. Service: This is the hotel with the best service I have ever seen, even better than Rose Poly. It can be said that this is not only a happy trip but also a lot of friends. A few people should focus on commenting and complimenting.
First of all, Jeffrey is our housekeeper this time. He is very attentive and considerate. He is not too close to you, not too enthusiastic or alienated. He always appears in the right place. In order to decorate the room to welcome us, there are quite a few roses, balloons, and welcome gifts, and we also specially arranged celebration cakes and upgraded the room, knowing the purpose of our trip. Due to the large number of tour groups on the day, I knew that after we arrived, we interrupted our meal time and went to the lobby to settle in alone for us to avoid waiting, and also advanced the time of arrival at 3 o'clock to 12 o'clock. I was so moved to cry~
Secondly, the service staff of Jinzun Lounge must also draw a circle of praise:
(1) Guo Han, the second friend we "made", can see that every service comes from the heart. Seeing that we always happily run over from a long distance to say hello, and tell us the characteristics of the hotel, and even help us to do the relevant operations of nucleic acid step by step, it is very sunny and caring.
(2) Xiaoyu, is the third friend of our "make", loves to laugh very much, and the bartenders are great. When I left the shop the day before, what I said was not a farewell word, but was very happy to tell us that she was there on the day she left and she must come. Let us feel that the contacts these days are like old friends who will definitely come to see you off, very warm.
(3) Emily is the fourth friend we "made". He is very professional and has a very strong affinity. He is also the first to collect our feedback and hope to be a better person with full professionalism.
2. Location: I really have to say that the location is really good. It‚Äôs nothing to say. The distance from duty-free shops, Fengqing Street, 68 is basically less than 15 yuan by taxi in minutes, and Linwang Night Market is almost 20 yuan (not recommended, it is undergoing renovation) A little less smoke and fire). It‚Äôs basically a 30-minute stroll from the Ferris wheel (always forget the name). 30 minutes to 301 Hospital (Beijing Medical Insurance, if you have it, is best to bring your medical insurance card, there is a separate nucleic acid point, the line will be faster.). The taxi fare for Nanhai Guanyin around 150 yuan has also arrived.
3. Hotel hardware: The benevolent sees the benevolent and the wise sees wisdom. The hotel rooms in Haitang Bay are very convoluted (including Kaaba, Poly), but this is particularly convoluted. The next day after I settled in, I slowly remembered how to walk and return. Room. Secondly, the layout of the room is not very flattering. The four-stage style of bathroom-dressing table-sleeping room-balcony makes the overall space more cramped. If possible, it is recommended to add a table and power socket on the balcony, which is convenient for eating hot pot haha. The other thing is that there is a bathtub on the balcony but it is not blocked. The opposite side can definitely be seen transparently. I think it doesn't matter whether there is such a thing or not.
4. Private hotel beach: Yes, and very close. This is better than Sunshine 1 Hotel (after all, it does not), and better than Poly (too far and nothing).
2. Disadvantages of the hotel:
1. It is impossible to check in by boat. One is on the 2nd floor and the other is on the 1st floor. It is almost the same to take a trip back to the room after dinner every day (about 10 minutes/circle).
2. The facilities should be Chinese retro, at least I didn't like it too much.
3. Poke the key point. This is very important. There are too many groups. I lived there for a week and went through the N group. From the meeting to the group building, there was a lot of singing, noisy voices, 7788 drunks, mezzo sopranos, and sopranos one after another. . .

msg:There are not too many entertainment projects in Haitang Bay, so I want to stay in a more distinctive hotel, and I chose Fairmont after careful consideration. It can be said that this trip is worthwhile! The hotel park is a reconstruction of a mansion, with a large area and a three-dimensional structure. It is like a two-dimensional independent world. The solid wood carved dome and huge murals and beams combine ancient and modern styles.
There are many covered bridge structures inside. From the height of the covered bridge, you can see the coconuts full of dangdang. The frangipani also has two colors. The red frangipani is the first time I see it. Along the garden, there is a long and long Yun River that runs through all the main buildings, and each tower stands on the river. Guting Qushui, Bluestone Road
. You can take a small dragon boat or step on a pedal boat to explore along the river.
Although Haitang Bay cannot go to the sea, it is also very pleasant to bask in the sun on the beach of the hotel. There is a huge grassland on the way to the beach. The beach wedding was being arranged on the day I went, and everything looked just right.
The afternoon tea snacks at ps Golden Restaurant are super delicious. They stood out among the hotels on this trip. The young lady in the restaurant is sweeter than chocolate.
Mrs. Yuri at the front desk was super nice, she enthusiastically provided us with a lot of help and gave me a small gift. In short, it was a very pleasant experience!

The biggest feature is that you can take a boat tour of the entire hotel, only the residents can, the privacy is very strong, and the experience is good. In addition, I saw that there were not many breakfasts, but the overall experience was good. There is room for improvement in other restaurants in the hotel.

Next time I come to Sanya, I will choose Fairmont

posted:Posted July 11, 2021
msg:The evaluation of this hotel on the Internet is very good, and I also saw the evaluation and came here with expectations.
I booked the itinerary for three days and two nights. The royal gardens and the quiet and high-quality service attracted me, but after I came to the hotel, I had many different experiences. It is like a story, accompanied by me for two days.
I really like the promenade leading to Datang when I got off the car, especially the promenade like the island of Maldives. This design allows people to have a wide view, and there is a good connection from the parking lot to the Datang, to feel the whole hotel Cultural a**osphere. Especially the black brother in the parking lot, very enthusiastic and courteous service is in place. When checking in, the hotel staff was very polite and enthusiastic. I did not upgrade the room. At the same time, the hotel manager also applied for the executive lounge for me, especially thanks to their manager, Mr. Li, who had a lot with him on the same day. The place I contacted, I hope I can have a good mood in this environment and enjoy my vacation time. When I returned to the room, the room was full of moldy smell, which is the place I can't stand the most, and the decoration of the whole room also looked heavy. The double bed room I originally ordered was now replaced with two double beds. It was inconvenient, so I contacted the front desk. The idea at the time was that if I look at other rooms, if they all smelled like this, I would check out and stay in other hotels. After I communicated with the front desk, the front desk arranged for their service staff to be changed to the opposite room by me. I didn't expect it to smell like this when the door was opened. I said, forget it. After a while, their manager personally took three room cards and took me room by room to see this kind of service. I was particularly moved. Finally, we chose a tasteless one to stay. It was already past nine o'clock at dinner, almost all the staff were off work, the kitchen of the Chinese restaurant was far away from the restaurant, and the service staff were also very hard. They served us. Although there was some unpleasantness in the middle, the manager of the restaurant , The manager of the hotel is very attentive to deal with it. Every staff member will greet you earnestly, warmly and sincerely. This feeling is very pleasant. She feels like home, and she cares about the feelings of each customer and cares about each other from the bottom of her heart. There are many recreational facilities. You can paddle a pedal boat on the water, take a dragon boat, and play water sports. I recommend this hotel for people who like quietness and garden style. Come here for a few more days to slowly experience the different artistic conceptions that the hotel brings to people. It is like a magnet, when in the first place. On the second day, I was slowly attracted. I seemed to feel a little reluctant. When the children were playing in the swimming pool, their hair was very wet. When they were going to eat in the restaurant, the young male manager of the catering depar**ent hurriedly distinguished the rooms. Go find a hair dryer for us, let the children dry their hair, and then come in to avoid catching a cold. The children‚Äôs amusement park in the hotel is very good, especially the library area on the second floor. The quiet facilities are clean and beautiful. It is suitable for children and parents to play for a long time. The breakfast has a special feature, and the gentleman who sells pineapple buns on his 28 bicycle attentively, Uncle Clown, who has been making balloons for children seriously, is very nice and sincere. When you are walking on the road, every employee will stop and greet you sincerely. When we check out, I found us The staff in the room where the children paint brushes and the manager on duty have been helping us to find them. Our courier is sent to the hotel, and the staff also arranges a special club to deliver it to the room. Swimming circle until we arrived at the next hotel, we found that we called the hotel manager, Manager Li Lihong, specially arranged for the staff to take a taxi to me to this hotel. Every hotel will not be 100% satisfied with every customer, at least this hotel is very attentive and doing things. They want to serve every customer well.

posted:Posted October 2, 2021
msg:Overall, I was very disappointed. I originally booked for 4 nights, but cancelled after staying for one day. Now I am worried about temporary hotel reservations.
The first is that the service is poor and the front desk attitude is very good, but like the robot, it will only repeat your question or repeat his last sentence. When we checked out, it was enough to give him the room card, and then when we arrived at the new hotel, we were told that the ID card had not been signed off, which delayed a lot of time. Later, a staff member called me and said that I had to pay a few tens of dollars, and finally I used Alipay to transfer it to him, and I don‚Äôt know if I was cheated.
The second is that the hardware does not work either. The parent-child suite we ordered, unexpectedly, only have a wooden floor in the middle and a rock slab around it, which is totally unsuitable for babies to crawl or barefoot. There is no bathtub, and bathing the baby is done in the sink. The toilet and bedroom are also not soundproofed, so I am afraid that my baby will be noisy when I go to the toilet at night. The overall decoration is not up to the five-star standard, and the scenery outside the window is a half-repaired building. The elevator cannot go directly to the first floor to the beach because the first floor has not been repaired, and I don't know if there is a formaldehyde problem, so you need to go to the lobby from the second floor first, and then go to the beach on the next floor, which is very winding. There are no lights on the back road to the beach, and there are no deck chairs and umbrellas on the beach. Very unfriendly.
But there are also better points. First, the appearance is pretty good, relatively new, and European style. Second, the breakfast is very rich, and it should be higher than the average in the five-star category, although I don't like the type of noodles.

Second, the catering category in the morning is pitiful compared to first-tier brands. Third, the biggest problem is the check-in front desk. The room type I was given went up and down. After complaining later, I changed to a larger room, but the nigh**are started. I didn't sleep all night. The air conditioner was old and there was a hanging Gree air conditioner. It was too noisy. The temperature display was very bright. There were lipstick marks on the bedding. There are also hairs and nose allergies because the last room is not often occupied. The decoration is very old and the bathroom is dirty. The welcome fruit is very poor, and the blueberries are sour. Because of this experience, I decisively asked to check out the next day, and the hotel also deducted the remaining balance. After a few days of depositing 30%, complaining to Ctrip and sending evidence photos, the hotel manager apologized and agreed to check out, and sent a car to the Edition. He apologized later, and finally contacted me to say that the Edition was over for the holiday. After that, you could take me to the airport, but I declined politely. My advice to the hotel is to promote the hotel objectively and spend enough money to renovate it after the acquisition. You can only accommodate people who don‚Äôt often go on vacation and have rich experience in resort hotels. People say you are wasting our vacation time. To sum up, don‚Äôt look at the recommendations from Xiaohongshu‚Äôs marketing account.
